messages.content: You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What types of SIM options are available for buying packages?

Nepal Telecom offers two SIM type options for purchasing packages: 1) Postpaid - for customers with monthly billing plans, and 2) Prepaid - for pay-as-you-go customers. Postpaid is selected by default when browsing packages.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What package categories does Nepal Telecom offer?

Nepal Telecom offers 9 main package categories: 1) Data Package (Winter), 2) Postpaid Rental Included Packages, 3) Unlimited TikTok Packs, 4) Unlimited Fb/Youtube Pack, 5) Voice Packs, 6) Day Packs, 7) SMS Packs, 8) Unlimited Hourly Data Pack, and 9) International Services.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What data packages are available in the Winter category?

The Data Package (Winter) category has 4 sub-categories: 1) Speed Upto 5 Mbps Data Pack - includes 1-day (Rs. 89) and 30-day (Rs. 999) options, 2) All Time Data Pack - with 12 options ranging from Rs. 22 to Rs. 999, 3) Volume Based Per Day Pack - 1.5GB/day for 30 days at Rs. 599, and 4) Combo Pack - Combo 199 Pack for 7 days with unlimited data upto 5Mbps and 50 min NT-NT voice per day.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
Tell me about the Speed Upto 5 Mbps Data Pack for 1 Day

The Speed Upto 5 Mbps Data Pack for 1 Day costs Rs. 89 and provides: 15GB data per day at speeds up to 5Mbps. After consuming 15GB, the speed is throttled to 1 Mbps for the remainder of the day. The pack is valid for 1 day and can be purchased through the 'Buy Now' option.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What are the cheapest data packages available?

The cheapest data packages are: 1) 600 MB Data Pack for 1 day - Rs. 22, 2) 1 GB Data Pack for 1 day - Rs. 30, 3) 1 Mbps Unlimited Data for 1 day - Rs. 49, 4) 5 GB Data Pack for 7 days - Rs. 109. For postpaid customers, there's also Add-On 1GB All Time Data Pack for Rs. 30 valid for 1 day.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What postpaid packages include monthly rental?

Postpaid Rental Included Packages include: 1) Sajilo Unlimited Add-On Packs (Rs. 30-99), 2) Postpaid Combo Pack - Postpaid 499 Pack (500 min voice, 8GB data, 100 SMS), 3) Sajilo Unlimited Basic Packs (Rs. 699-1999 with unlimited voice and 15-200GB data), 4) Postpaid Basic Voice Packs (Rs. 373 with 500-800 min), and 5) Rental Included Data Packages - 20GB for 30 days at Rs. 399. All include monthly rental for postpaid subscribers.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
Tell me about the Sajilo Unlimited packages

Sajilo Unlimited packages are postpaid rental-included packages with 5 options: 1) Sajilo Unlimited 699 Pack - Rs. 699 for 30 days with unlimited voice, 15GB data, 200 SMS, 2) Sajilo Unlimited 799 Pack - Rs. 799 for 30 days with unlimited voice, 30GB data, 250 SMS, 3) Sajilo Unlimited 999 Pack - Rs. 999 for 30 days with unlimited voice, 60GB data, 300 SMS, 4) Sajilo Unlimited 1499 Pack - Rs. 1499 for 30 days with unlimited voice, 100GB data, 350 SMS, and 5) Sajilo Unlimited Executive 1999 Pack - Rs. 1999 for 30 days with unlimited voice, 200GB data, 500 SMS. All include add-on pack availability via *1442#.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
Do you have TikTok packages?

Yes, Nepal Telecom offers two Unlimited TikTok Packs: 1) Unlimited TikTok pack for 7 days - Rs. 170 with daily 20GB at 5Mbps, throttled to 2Mbps after FUP, and 2) Unlimited TikTok pack for 1 day - Rs. 48 with 20GB at 5Mbps, throttled to 1Mbps after FUP. Both are designed specifically for TikTok usage.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What Facebook and YouTube packages are available?

Nepal Telecom offers separate Unlimited Facebook and YouTube packs at Rs. 55 each, valid for 3 days. Both provide unlimited access to their respective platforms with FUP: after consuming 5GB at 2Mbps, speed is throttled to 1Mbps. You can choose either Unlimited Facebook Pack or Unlimited YouTube Pack based on your preference.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What voice calling packages are available?

Voice Packs come in two main types: 1) All Time All Network Voice Packages - for calls to all networks (Rs. 25-279 for 40-555 minutes, 1-30 days), and 2) All Time Voice Pack(NT-NT) - for NT-to-NT calls only (Rs. 18-269 for 30-555 minutes, 1-30 days). There are also Day Packs for NT-NT unlimited calls: Rs. 20 (5AM-5PM) and Rs. 30 (24-hour unlimited).

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What SMS packages does Nepal Telecom offer?

Nepal Telecom offers three SMS Packs for all-network national SMS: 1) 200 SMS for 1 day - Rs. 35, 2) 200 SMS for 7 days - Rs. 60, and 3) 500 SMS for 28 days - Rs. 150. All packs are valid for sending SMS to all national telecommunication networks in Nepal.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
Are there any hourly data packages?

Yes, Nepal Telecom offers Unlimited Hourly Data Packs: 1) Unlimited Pack for 1 hour - Rs. 25 with unlimited data and NT-NT voice for 60 minutes (FUP: throttled to 2Mbps after 2GB), and 2) Unlimited Data for 2 hours - Rs. 35 with unlimited data for 2 hours (FUP: throttled to 2Mbps after 4GB). Both start from time of subscription.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What international services packages are available?

International Services include: 1) China Call Packs - 10 min (Rs. 35/1 day), 45 min (Rs. 150/7 days), 165 min (Rs. 500/30 days), 2) India Call Packs - 20 min (Rs. 80/1 day), 75 min (Rs. 270/7 days), 3) Data Roaming for India - daily (100MB/Rs. 100), weekly (500MB/Rs. 450), monthly (1GB/Rs. 900), and 4) Global Data Roaming Packs - Group A-D countries with 200MB-1GB for 3 days at Rs. 500-1000.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What are some featured packages?

Featured packages include: 40 min All Net Voice (Rs. 25/1 day), Data Pack 55GB (Rs. 899/28 days), Rental Data 30GB (Rs. 499/30 days), Unlimited TikTok 7 days (Rs. 170), China Voice Call 165 min (Rs. 500/30 days), Add-On 1GB (Rs. 30/1 day), Unlimited NT-NT Voice (Rs. 30/1 day), Data Pack 30GB (Rs. 499/28 days), India Voice Call 20 min (Rs. 80/1 day), and Data Pack 10GB (Rs. 299/30 days).

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
How do I subscribe to a data package?

You can subscribe to data packages in several ways: 1) Use the 'Buy Now' button on the Nepal Telecom website/app, 2) Dial *1415# for many data packages, 3) Dial *1442# for Sajilo Unlimited add-on packs, 4) Dial *1415*7# for roaming activation. For postpaid packages, monthly rental is automatically included. Always check the specific subscription method mentioned in each package description.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What is the Combo 199 Pack?

The Combo 199 Pack costs Rs. 199 and is valid for 7 days. It includes: Unlimited Data at speeds up to 5 Mbps, plus 50 minutes of NT-to-NT voice calls per day. This is a combination package that provides both data and voice services in a single pack, offering good value for users who need both services regularly.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What data roaming packages are available for India?

For India Data Roaming, Nepal Telecom offers: 1) India Daily Roaming Pack - 100MB for Rs. 100 valid 1 day, 2) India Weekly Roaming Pack - 500MB for Rs. 450 valid 7 days, and 3) India Monthly Roaming Pack - 1024MB (1GB) for Rs. 900 valid 28 days. To activate roaming service, dial *1415*7# before traveling.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What is the Unlimited NT-NT Day Voice Pack from 5AM-5PM?

The Unlimited NT-NT Day Voice Pack from 5:00 AM to 5:00 PM costs Rs. 20 and is valid for 1 day. It provides unlimited voice calls within the Nepal Telecom network only during daytime hours (5AM to 5PM). This is perfect for users who make most of their calls during business hours and want an affordable unlimited calling option.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What is the difference between All Net and NT-NT voice packages?

The main difference is network coverage: 1) All Net Voice Packages allow calls to ALL national telecommunication networks in Nepal (NT, Ncell, etc.), while 2) NT-NT Voice Packages only allow calls within the Nepal Telecom network (NT to NT). NT-NT packages are generally cheaper since they're limited to one network. Choose All Net if you call other networks frequently, or NT-NT if you mostly call other Nepal Telecom numbers.

You are a helpful Nepal Telecom assistant helping customers find and understand available packages. Provide clear, accurate information about package details, pricing, validity, and subscription methods.
What is the 1.5 GB per day for 30 Days package?

The 1.5 GB per day for 30 Days package costs Rs. 599 and provides 1.5GB of data every day for 30 days. This is a volume-based per day pack where you get a fresh 1.5GB allocation each day. *Note: For postpaid users, this package includes the monthly rental. The total data over 30 days would be 45GB, distributed as 1.5GB daily.
